languages.text: "Я разрываюсь между двумя желаниями — прочитать вам лекцию про неудачное время и место или же выразить свое удивление методами моральной поддержки Инквизиции".
"I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."
languages.original_text: "Я разрываюсь между двумя желаниями — прочитать вам лекцию про неудачное время и место или же выразить свое удивление методами моральной поддержки Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."
"I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."
"I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."
"I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

languages.text: “我确实有些进退两难，我不知道是该谴责你选择了极其糟糕的时机和场合，还是该对审判庭提供‘道义支持’的方式感到震惊。”
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: “我确实有些进退两难，我不知道是该谴责你选择了极其糟糕的时机和场合，还是该对审判庭提供‘道义支持’的方式感到震惊。”

languages.text: « En fait, je suis partagé. Je ne sais pas si je dois vous faire la leçon sur votre sens du timing et votre choix d'environnement, qui laissent tous les deux à désirer, ou si je dois plutôt vous exprimer mon étonnement quant aux méthodes de soutien moral auxquelles l'Inquisition semble avoir recours. »
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: « En fait, je suis partagé. Je ne sais pas si je dois vous faire la leçon sur votre sens du timing et votre choix d'environnement, qui laissent tous les deux à désirer, ou si je dois plutôt vous exprimer mon étonnement quant aux méthodes de soutien moral auxquelles l'Inquisition semble avoir recours. »

languages.text: «Me empujan dos impulsos y no sé cuál seguir: el de sermonearle por su pobre elección de momento y lugar o el de expresar mi asombro ante las técnicas de apoyo moral de la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: «Me empujan dos impulsos y no sé cuál seguir: el de sermonearle por su pobre elección de momento y lugar o el de expresar mi asombro ante las técnicas de apoyo moral de la Inquisición».

languages.text: 「私は2つの欲望の間で葛藤している…怪しいタイミングと舞台の選択について説教するか、異端審問庁の道徳的支援の方法に驚きを述べるか」
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: 「私は2つの欲望の間で葛藤している…怪しいタイミングと舞台の選択について説教するか、異端審問庁の道徳的支援の方法に驚きを述べるか」

languages.text: "Ich bin hin- und hergerissen zwischen zwei Instinkten: Einerseits, Euch einen Vortrag über Eure miserable Wahl des Zeitpunkts und des Orts zu halten. Andererseits, meinem Erstaunen darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, mit welchen Methoden die Inquisition moralische Unterstützung bietet."
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hin- und hergerissen zwischen zwei Instinkten: Einerseits, Euch einen Vortrag über Eure miserable Wahl des Zeitpunkts und des Orts zu halten. Andererseits, meinem Erstaunen darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, mit welchen Methoden die Inquisition moralische Unterstützung bietet."

languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

languages.text: "Hakikaten ne söyleyeceğimi bilemiyorum... Yaptığın işin yerini, zamanını mı eleştireyim... Engizisyon'un manevi destek anlayışına mı hayret edeyim?"
languages.original_text: "I am torn between two desires — to lecture you about your shoddy timing and choice of setting, or to express my astonishment at the Inquisition's methods of moral support."

traits.locale_text: "Hakikaten ne söyleyeceğimi bilemiyorum... Yaptığın işin yerini, zamanını mı eleştireyim... Engizisyon'un manevi destek anlayışına mı hayret edeyim?"
